name: Steve's Pub - Soda on tap
summary:
In Steve's Pub - Soda on Tab you are a professional bartender, you will experience serving guests with drinks in virtual reality (VR).

Steve's Pub features different locations like pub, bar and brewery festival. It is a VR experience with nice graphics and the gameplay from good old 8-bit computer games in the 80s.

We are aiming to bring a full gameplay in the first released version with a minimum of two locations. Later on we will extended more locations, additional gameplay like mini games and and more challenging gameplay.

Currently we developing for HTC Vive. Support for Oculus in the future is planned.

Features:
Funny and slapstick gameplay.
Two different locations in the first release.
Practice mode
Unlockable decor items and music
